actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act in order to apply the provisions of that act to materials needed to prevent disruption of the national economy.

summary.text: States that the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act shall apply to materials needed to prevent disruption of the national economy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act in order to apply the provisions of that act to materials needed to prevent disruption of the national economy.
